val: function() local first = nil; local found = false; for k,v in pairs(ASSET.levels) do if not first then first = v; end if found then LEVEL.unload(); LEVEL.load(v); love.graphics.clear(); return; end if v==LEVEL.currentLevel then found = true; end end LEVEL.unload(); LEVEL.load(first); love.graphics.clear(); end
title:
Level
Cycle
